```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(p8105.datasets)
```


```{r}
data("instacart")

instacart = 
  instacart %>% 
  select(add_to_cart_order, order_dow, order_hour_of_day, aisle, department) %>% 
  mutate(order_dow = recode(
    order_dow,
    "0" = "sunday",
    "1" = "monday",
    "2" = "tuesday",
    "3" = "wednesday",
    "4" = "thursday",
    "5" = "friday",
    "6" = "saturday")) 

```


```{r}
instacart %>% 
  group_by(order_dow, aisle) %>% 
  summarise(mean_hour = mean(order_hour_of_day, na.rm = TRUE)) %>% 
  mutate(order_dow = fct_reorder(order_dow, mean_hour)) %>% 
  plot_ly(
   x = ~ y = ~mean_hour, color = ~aisle,  type = "box", colors = "viridis")

```


```{r}
group_by(aisle) %>% 
  summarise(n = n()) %>% 
  filter(n > 10000) %>% 
  arrange(desc(n))
